duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate front-end trucks to collect and transport waste and recyclables from residential and commercial routes.
Perform daily pre- and post-trip inspections of the vehicle and submit vehicle condition reports.
Interact courteously with customers and the general public along the route, answering questions and responding to requests.
Maintain clean customer sites and safety along roads and highways by cleaning loose trash.
Submit logbook, daily route/productivity sheet, and vehicle condition report as required by law or company policy.
Follow safe operating practices and safety standards, including lockout/tagout procedures.
Monitor operations to detect loose debris and conduct visual scans of customer sites before and after dumping.
Conduct employment screening, hiring, training, evaluating, and developing personnel to meet service commitments.
Adhere to wage and hour laws, compensate personnel for services rendered, and practice progressive discipline with employee performance issues.
Ensure safe working conditions, plan and operate landfill operations, and establish and review productivity standards.
Promote an effective safety program, investigate accidents, and ensure proper supply and usage of safety equipment.
Conform with applicable laws, regulations, ordinances, company policies, procedures, and directives from supervisors.
Perform other duties and responsibilities as required or requested by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree from a four-year college or university, or equivalent combination of required education and experience.
